00018 #define _VIENNACL_HANDLE_HPP_

00029 #include "viennacl/ocl/error.hpp"
00030 
00031 namespace viennacl
00032 {
00033   namespace ocl
00034   {
00035     template<class OCL_TYPE>
00036     class handle
00037     {
00038     public:
00039       handle() : something(0) {}
00040       handle(const OCL_TYPE & _something) : something(_something) {}
00041       handle(const handle & h) : something(h.something) { inc(); }
00042       ~handle() { if (something != 0) dec(); }
00043       handle & operator=(const handle & h)
00044       {
00045         if (something != 0) dec();
00046         something = h.something;
00047         inc();
00048         return *this;
00049       }
00050       handle & operator=(const OCL_TYPE & _something)
00051       {
00052         if (something != 0) dec();
00053         something = _something;
00054         return *this;
00055       }
00056       operator OCL_TYPE() const { return something; }
00057       const OCL_TYPE & get() const { return something; }
00058     private:
00059       void inc();
00060       void dec();
00061       OCL_TYPE something;
00062     };
00063 
00064     
00066     
00067     template<>
00068     void handle<cl_mem>::dec()
00069     {
00070       cl_int err = clReleaseMemObject(something);
00071       CL_ERR_CHECK(err);
00072       //assert(err == CL_SUCCESS || err == CL_INVALID_MEM_OBJECT);
00073       //cout << "DEC cl_mem HANDLE" << endl;
00074     }
00075 
00076     template<>
00077     void handle<cl_mem>::inc()
00078     {
00079       cl_int err = clRetainMemObject(something);
00080       CL_ERR_CHECK(err);
00081       //assert(err == CL_SUCCESS || err == CL_INVALID_MEM_OBJECT);
00082       //cout << "INC cl_mem HANDLE" << endl;
00083     }
00084 
00085     template<>
00086     void handle<cl_program>::dec()

00088       cl_int err = clReleaseProgram(something);
00089       CL_ERR_CHECK(err);
00090       //assert(err == CL_SUCCESS || err == CL_INVALID_PROGRAM);
00091       //cout << "DEC cl_program HANDLE" << endl;
00092     }

00101     }
